title: The Week of Oscar Wood: The Coaching Crusader
summary: Over one week, Oscar Wood discovers his unique ability to inspire and empower troubled youths through his latent superpowers, helping them overcome their issues.
summaryGerman: Über eine Woche entdeckt Oscar Wood seine einzigartige Fähigkeit, durch seine latenten Superkräfte problematische Jugendliche zu inspirieren und zu stärken und ihnen zu helfen, ihre Probleme zu überwinden.
summaryDutch: Gedurende één week ontdekt Oscar Wood zijn unieke vermogen om probleemjongeren te inspireren en te empoweren door zijn latente superkrachten, hen helpend hun problemen te overwinnen.
summaryFrench: Au cours d'une semaine, Oscar Wood découvre sa capacité unique à inspirer et à autonomiser les jeunes en difficulté grâce à ses superpouvoirs latents, les aidant à surmonter leurs problèmes.

story.text: Oscar Wood felt an unusual surge of energy as he coached his local youth soccer team. The day had a triumphant aura, ending with Oscar unknowingly transferring some of his energy to a particularly despondent player who suddenly played extraordinarily well.

The next day, while advising at the community center, Oscar noticed his words seemed to have a real physical effect on the teenagers, empowering them in visible ways. His advice didn't just go through the ears; it sparked motivation and change.
Midweek brought eerie events; his coaching whistle glowed faintly each time he blew it during practice, which unnerved Oscar but also sparked his curiosity about his growing powers.

On Thursday, a joyous realization hit him. Oscar embraced his newfound abilities, understanding that they could be used to transform lives positively and permanently, which made him feel peaceful yet responsible.

Utilizing his powers intentionally for the first time, Oscar held a special session for kids dealing with self-esteem issues. Each word he spoke seemed to build them up, literally and figuratively, leading to an epic transformation in their demeanor.
Feeling romantic, Oscar arranged a day off with his wife to reflect on his incredible week. They discussed the vast possibilities and responsibilities of his abilities, deepening their bond.

On the final day, a happy Oscar decided to set up a personal development workshop, aiming to reach more youths across the city. His story began to spread, inviting curiosity and hope from the community.

moral: With great power comes great responsibility; use your gifts to uplift others.
